settings.editor: BPIT is a pioneer Institute providing education to the students of Delhi and outside Delhi in the field of engineering and management since more than a decade. BPIT is the only self financing institute affiliated to GGSIP University whose all UG engineering programs (B.Tech CSE/IT/ ECE / EEE) are NBA (National Board of Accreditation) which in itself certifies the quality policy and standards followed in BPIT.

settings.description_text:
BPIT is an ‘A’ grade Institute of GGSIPU and all the B. Tech program are NBA accredited. 

The Institute is ranked between a bracket of 250-300 in NIRF ranking among all Engineering Institutes in India.

The Placements in BPIT are touching new heights with recruitments in multinational companies like Amazon, Adobe, Infosys, Wipro, IBM, Accenture, Cognizant, Airtel, Oppo, ZS Associates and many more.

settings.title:
To establish a leading Global center of excellence in multidisciplinary education, training and research in the area of Engineering, Technology and Management. To produce technologically competent, morally & emotionally strong and ethically sound
professionals who excel in their chosen field, practice commitment to their profession and dedicate themselves to the service of mankind.

• To develop world class Laboratories and other Infrastructure conducive in acquiring latest knowledge and expertise.
  • To bridge the knowledge and competency gaps of institute’s fresh pass-outs vis-à-vis field requirements.
  • To strengthen Industry- Institute Interaction and partnership for imbibing corporate culture amongst our faculty and students.
  • To promote research culture among faculty and students enhancing their academic and professional confidence needed to face global challenges.
  • To honour commitment towards social and moral values.

• To breed excellence in all endeavours.
  • To impart quality education and training at par with international standards.
  • To strengthen Industry- Institute Interaction and partnership for imbibing corporate culture amongst our faculty and students
  • To spread quality consciousness among all associates.

settings.editor: Placement cell is giving better performance year by year. Various companies for all the courses visit the campus every year. College starts placement activities in the 7th semester and preparation begin as soon as 6th semester.

Faculty of college is good, the campus is also very well organized and all the basic facilities are available here, the connectivity of the college is also good and there is no problem of transport here.

College provides good placement to it's students and the environment it provides to the students is extremely productive and the faculty of the college is also good. Recently amazon web service offered 30 lac packages to 5 students.

In addition to our world class infrastructure, we also offer an option to take part in a live classroom. It takes place in our vast campus located in Rohini, Delhi. Here you'll be able to use the most up-to-date facilities and computer equipment.

In addition to our world class infrastructure, we also offer outdoor and indoor sports facility. Institute supports various cultural events and also have various societies to cater the need of creative minds to flourish and perform.

settings.address: Bhagwan parshuram institute of technology, rohini, delhi
